src/lib/components/AgChartsJS.jsx.description:
AgChartsJS renders AG Charts using options stored in window.AGCHART_CONFIGS.
Supply inline `options` or reference an `optionsKey`; the component resolves
dynamic configs and keeps the chart instance updated for Dash layouts.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

className.description: Optional CSS class applied to the chart container.

style.description: Inline styles for sizing/positioning the chart container.

options.description: Chart options object to render. If provided, overrides optionsKey lookup.

optionsKey.description: Key used to look up chart options from window.AGCHART_CONFIGS.

configArgs.description: Optional JSON-serialisable payload passed to config factory functions.

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback for reporting property changes (unused for charts).

src/lib/components/AgGridJS.jsx.description:
AgGridJS mounts AgGridReact using configurations stored on window.AGGRID_CONFIGS.
The component relays selection, filter, sort, and edit events back to Dash via setProps.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

configKey.description: Key used to look up a configuration object in window.AGGRID_CONFIGS.

className.description: Optional CSS class to apply to the outer grid container.

style.description: Inline style object applied to the grid container.

configArgs.description: Optional JSON-serialisable payload passed to config factory functions.

registerProps.description:
Optional list of extra Dash props this grid is allowed to emit (e.g. ["cellDoubleClicked"]).
These are appended to the component's available_properties on the Python side.

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback for reporting property changes to Dash.

selectedRows.description: Array of row objects selected in the grid. Populated by the component.

filterModel.description: Current AG Grid filter model. Populated by the component.

sortModel.description: Current AG Grid sort model (colId, sort, sortIndex). Populated by the component.

rowData.description: Row data provided directly from Dash. Overrides rowData defined in the JS config.
